subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets lost their second straight to the Atlanta Braves. Jose Reyes left the game with an injury. Mike Pelfrey had his third bad start in a row. Is it time to panic?
snippet: The Mets lost their second straight to the Atlanta Braves. Jose Reyes left the game with an injury. Mike Pelfrey had his third bad start in a row. Is it time to panic?
